recommendations: “Working with Pallavi has been a great experience as an immediate manager for a brief period and as an HOD. She has an uncanny ability to break the tasks into micro details and tirelessly follow till the last mile. She was intrumental in many cutting edge initiatives on i-range like launch of i-can help & i-sure which helped the brand & division to touch new milestones.
